name: Users - Change a user's email address, with verification on

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)

inline.description:
1. Other user creates account, logs in
  2. System admin changes other user's email address (this does not log them out, but the system does send them an email notifying them that "You" - as in the person themselves - updated their own email address). See MM-14454 for more details.
  3. User logs out and can still log in with old email address until they click the verification link in the email
inline.expectedResult: • User can log in after verification, and also receives email confirmation that email address has been changed

customFields.Related ticket(s):
• Update wording in notification email received by end-user after a System Admin has changed the user's email address — MM-14454
  • Implement confirmation modal for System Admin when changing a user's email address via the System Console — MM-14455
